title: Award-winning comic heads to Hampshire
text:
MULTI-award winning comic Sean Hughes is back on the road this autumn with his new show – Mumbo Jumbo. 
Throughout his life Sean has been battling to stay on the right side of sanity. 
But now as he reaches middle age he has realised that the two sides of his brain are in constant conflict: common sense against mumbo jumbo and mumbo jumbo seems to have the upper hand. 
Hear Sean’s stories about being serenaded by Robert Smith, trekking mountain gorillas in Rwanda and coming to the conclusion that he will never have a proper conversation with his dear mum. 
There will be a few poems and a three-minute musical about ageing too. Share article 
Sean Hughes brings Mumbo Jumbo to The Berry Theatre on Saturday November 7 at 8pm. 
Call 023 8065 2333 or visit theberrytheatre.co.uk. Promoted Stories Award-winning comic heads to Hampshire Sorry, an error occurred.
